bug.short_desc: qx.ui.form.TextField doesn't show context menu on ipad

long_desc.thetext:
1. Open any page with qx.ui.form.TextField (e.g. http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/widgetbrowser/) 2. Tap twice on TextField
Expected: Context menu with copy/paste/select options appears Actual result: TextField gets focus (keyboard appears) and looses focus right after that (keyboard disappears), no context menu
Second tap on focused text field always moves focus from that text field.
Video: http://screencast.com/t/ZeXRXHziA

(In reply to comment #0) > Expected: Context menu with copy/paste/select options appears > Actual result: TextField gets focus (keyboard appears) and looses focus right > after that (keyboard disappears), no context menu
Why do you expect that the context menu will pop up on a double tap?

(In reply to comment #1) > Why do you expect that the context menu will pop up on a double tap?
Cause this is what happens when I put focus on simple html input text field and do double-tap: http://screencast.com/t/nkP1KFSUp
However I cannot get context menu on qx.ui.form.TextField - I cannot copy/paste/etc.
